notes: Get category tree (recursive parent-child structure). Returns array of category objects.
Get filter schema for category. Returns filter fields and options for search/discovery.

List/search listings. Optional filters: category_id, status (default: published), attrs (attributes), pagination. Returns {data, meta} format when tenant_id filter used (Account Portal store scope), otherwise legacy array format.
Get single listing by ID. Returns listing object with full details.
Search listings with filters and availability checks. category_id is required. Returns {data, meta} format. Only published listings. Recursive category filtering (includes descendants).
Get offers for a listing. Returns array of offer objects.
Get single offer by ID. Returns offer object.
